thread.title: Hudson hotel
thread.title_full: Hudson hotel - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gers54andy
title: Hudson hotel
text: this is very good hotel ina central location close to central park broaday and time Square,room may small but it's only for sleeping in (its new York after all) all the staff from the maids to reception all very happy and helpful,anything we required was sorted straight away,the hotel is close to many eateries of various price, supermarkets and shops if visiting NY would quite happily stay at the Hudson again
